name: A. Turtle and Piggy Are Playing a Game
statement:
Turtle and Piggy are playing a number game.First, Turtle will choose an
integer x, such that l
le x
le r, where l, r are given. Itâ€™s also guaranteed that 2l
le r.Then, Piggy will keep doing the following operation until x becomes
1: Choose an integer p such that p
ge 2 and p
mid x (i.e. x is a multiple of p). Set x to
frac{x}{p}, and the score will increase by 1. The score is initially 0.
Both Turtle and Piggy want to maximize the score. Please help them to
calculate the maximum score.
solutions: #include<bits/stdc++.h>#define LL long long#define LLL __int128#define uint unsigned#define ldb long double#define uLL unsigned long longusing namespace std;inline void MAIN(){	int l,r;	cin>>l>>r;	cout<<__lg(r)<<'\n';}signed main(){    cin.tie(0)->sync_with_stdio(0);	int t=1;cin>>t;while(t--)MAIN();    return 0;}/**/
